description: Radonti Description
name: Saying no to rats

description: Sauria Description

description: eme eme eme
name: For Not Erroring

description: You and your crew carefully mined the asteroid and found fuel.
name: Mine Carefully

description: You and your crew aggressively mined the asteroid and found fuel , earning 20 fuel but losing 20 spareparts in the process
name: Mine Aggressively

description: Leave it
name: You left the asteroid alone

Choice-1:
You and your crew carefully mined the asteroid and found fuel. 
+ 10 Fuel
 - 10/@SPAREPARTS() Spare Parts
Choice-2:
You and your crew aggressively mined the asteroid and found fuel.
+ 20 Fuel
 - 20/@SPAREPARTS() Spare Parts
description: Captain, I detect a mineral rich asteroid approaching. We could mine it for Hydro carbic resources if we have your permission
name: Foreign Object Detected!

description: The material seems to be the ones used for Biogene
name: Gather the unidentified material.

description: The material seems to be the ones used for Biogene
name: Gather the unidentified material.

Choice-2: Stay safe and leave the asteroid
description: Captain, I detected a cluster of asteroids near your vicinity. After a scan, I discovered an unidentified material inside of the asteroid.
name: Foreign Object Detected!

description: You accepted their help, and they gave you some supplies in return.
name: Trade fuel

description: You accepted their help, and they gave you some supplies in return.
name: Trade spare parts

description: You decided to leave and ignore the F.E.L.A.S.
name: Ignore and leave

description: Captain, I detected a cluster of asteroids near your vicinity. After a scan, I discovered an unidentified material inside of the asteroid.
name: Foreign Object Detected!

description: Captain, as we passed a nearby star, your solar panels have accumulated some extra energy. Do you want to use it immediately for our fuel supply or store it for emergency?
name: an specialize energy Detected!

description: It seems to be frozen cans of oxygen. It still has some oxygen left.
name: Take the ice that hit your shuttle

description: The shuttle steered clear before getting hit with more ice.
name: Steer clear

description: Frozen cans start to hit your shuttle, do you want to take the ice or steer clear of them?
name: a Foreign Object Detected

description: Captain, as we passed a nearby star, your solar panels have accumulated some extra energy. Do you want to use it immediately for our fuel supply or store it for emergency?
name: an specialize energy Detected!

description: Your crew gathered some fuel for your ship while traversing the route.
name: Take the asteroid field route

description: Your crew found old crates full of spare parts floating while traversing the route.
name: Take the old trade route

description: Captain, based on my database, I have uncovered a star chart ahead of our location. We can take two routes from here. One is a fuel rich asteroid field, and the other is an old route for trade.
name: Location Found!

description: Your crew received FELAS’s help.
name: Accept it gratefully

description: FELAS offered you ration instead of fuel.
name: Refuse their pity !

description: A vessel of F.E.L.A.S (Federation of Extraterrestrial Lifeform Assistance and Supplies) they are offering you fuel as a pity for what happened to our planet. The leader that wants to hand the supplies identifies as Yuri Gagarin
name: Location Found!

description: The mold grew from the rations. After a while you removed it.
name: Let the mold grow a bit more.

description: You got rid of the mold you didn’t have enough to create biogene.
name: Get rid of it immediately.

Choice-1:
Let the mold brow a bit more.  
 + 10 Biogene 
 – 10/@FOOD()
description: Captain, there was a report of mold growing inside the storage, but this variant might be cultivated for biogene. Should we let it grow for a little bit more time?
name: Biogene Mold

description: The crew salvages parts but risks encountering hostiles.
name: Head to the destroyed shuttle.

description: The crew maintains a safe distance, avoiding risk.
name: It might be an ambush

Choice-1:
Head to the destroyed shuttle. 
 +20 Spareparts
Choice-2: The crew maintains a safe distance, avoiding risk.
description: Captain, I suggest replacing our radio wave transmitter and receiver. I just happened to scan a nearby destroyed shuttle with the same model as ours.
name: Replace Radio wave transmitter and receiver.

description: The tape works effectively, fixing the shutters.
name: Fix the shutters using duct tape

description: The crew uses spare parts for a sturdier repair.
name: Fix the shutters using spare parts

description: The crew suffers minor damage from the solar flare but conserves resources.
name: Brace for impact

Choice-1:
Fix the shutters using duct tape. 
Cost -1 Ductape
Choice-2:
Fix the shutters using spare part. 
 –20 Spareparts
description: Captain, I detected an eminent solar flare. One of the shutters seems to be ripping off. We could use duct tape to fix the shutters or use spare parts as an alternative.
name: Eminent Solar Flare

description: The crew pushes through but sustains minor damage.
name: Proceed and fix the damages later

description: The crew avoids the magnetic field but takes a longer path.
name: Go to the alternate route

Choice-1:
Proceed and fix the damages later 
Cost Spareparts 10/@SPAREPARTS()
Choice-2:
Go to the alternate route.
Cost -10/@FUEL() Fuel
description: Captain, the navigation has detected a magnetic field ahead. Should we proceed or find an alternate path. If you choose to proceed, we will need to fix the damage that we will sustain
name: Magnetic Field Detected

description: The crew conserve fuel.
name: Glide through the field

description: The crew avoids the anomaly but consumes extra fuel.
name: Try to find an alternative path

Choice-1:
Proceed and fix the damages later
 Gain 10 Fuel
Choice-2:
Go to the alternate route.
 COST 15/@FUEL() Fuel
description: Captain, sensors indicate a nearby low-gravity field. I recommend drifting through to conserve fuel. However, mapping this anomaly could also be beneficial for us.
name: Nearby Low-Gravity Field.

description: The crew gathers unusual material with medicinal properties.
name: Study it further

description: The crew avoid any potential risk from the unknown phenomenon
name: Keep our distance

description: Captain, the crew reports a peculiar signal from a nearby star. Scans reveal energy patterns that match no known phenomenon. Shall we study it further or keep our distance?
name: Unknown phenomenon.

description: The engine is optimized, increasing operational stability
name: Invest in Maintenance

description: The engine suffers from wear, impacting operational efficiency
name: Ignore Maintenance

Choice-1:
Proceed and fix the damages later 
Cost 10/@SPAREPARTS() Spareparts
Choice-2:
Go to the alternate route.
Cost 10/@FUEL() Fuel
description: Captain, engine maintenance is due. Ignoring it could reduce fuel efficiency. A small investment in resources now may save us in the long run.
name: Engine Maintenance

description: Pirates accepted the bribe and left without any conflict.
name: Offer bribe

description: The crew escapes but sustains damage.
name: Attempt to Escape

description: A hostile vessel detected on our scanners, Captain. It’s displaying pirate insignia. Shall we offer a bribe to avoid conflict, or attempt an escape?
name: Space Pirates

description: The crew repairs the communication system
name: Investigate further

description: Communication resumes after a delay, with no resource cost.
name: Wait until the signal resumes

description: All external communications are down. I’m attempting to trace the issue. We can either investigate further or wait until the signal resumes
name: Communication Channel Down

description: The light revealed to be harmless probe that left after a brief communication
name: Attempt Communication

description: The crew prepares for conflict, but the light leaves after a few minutes.
name: Prepare for defense

description: Captain, a strange light is following our shuttle, I can’t detect whether they are hostile or not. What actions do you suggest?
name: Strange Light

description: huwahuwa
name: TestingCondition

description: Your crew gathered the debris of what is assumed the ISS carefully.
name: Gather the Materials Carefully

description: Your crew tried to gather as much materials as you can before they float away
name: Gather as much materials as possible

Choice-2: Gather as much materials as possible
description: There is debris with the ISS logo on it outside the ship. We can gather those debris for materials. What approach do we do?
name: Debris of the old ISS

description: You and your crew has offered a tribute to Laika
name: Offer a tribute to Laika

description: Your crew has no time for tributes and has continued through their navigation.
name: Continue navigating

description: We are near the orbital path of Sputnik, where Laika, the first animal in space, once orbited. We could honor her with a brief tribute.
name: Space dog Laika tribute

description: You traded your spare parts in the storage room for rations.
name: Trade spare parts for foods

description: You and your team did not attend the event.
name: Leave event.

description: A shipment of a canning company has been seen hosting a trade event for foods in exchange for scraps. Should we take part in the event, Captain?
name: Canning company trade event

description: You examined the odd technology
name: Examine the alien technology

description: You dismantled the alien technology
name: Dismantle the technology

description: Captain, I have retrieved an old alien technology near our vicinity. We could examine it for its usage, or we could scrap it for spare parts. What is your action?
name: Alien Technology

description: You paid for the Rations
name: Pay for the Rations

description: You paid for the Spare Parts
name: Pay for the Spare Parts

description: A vessel with no affiliation is approaching our shuttle, captain. Tractor beam detected, unable to move. You are greeted by the leader of F.E.L.A.S. It seems that they are holding us hostage in exchange for 50 Ration or 50 Spare Parts.
name: F.E.L.A.S. Betrayal

description: You dismantled the tracker.
name: Dismantle it

description: It might just be a harmless device...
name: Keep it

description: Captain, the gift supplies from the leader of F.E.L.A.S. contains an unknown device that pings our location on an unknown vessel, what do you wish to do with the device?
name: A Planted Tracker?

description: You accepted their gift.
name: Accept the gift

description: You refused their suspicious gift.
name: Refuse the gift

description: Another vessel from F.E.L.A.S has been detected, captain. Their leader has been thinking fondly of you and your crew and has given you a gift. Should we accept their gift?
name: Gift from the F.E.L.A.S.

description: You found rations at the corner of the room!
name: Check the corners of the room

description: You ignored the unknown presence
name: Leave it be

Choice-1:
Check the corners of the room
+-???
description: Captain, I have detected an unknown presence on the storage room. I suggest immediate investigation of the room.
name: An Unknown Presence

description: You and your crew watched the beautiful nebula
name: Bask in the beauty of the nebula

description: You ignored the nebula and continued on
name: Continue travels

Choice-1:
Bask in the beauty of the nebula
(+5 Crew Sanity)
description: We are now approaching a charted nebula. If you look outside, you can immediately see it. I suggest staying for a while to see this once in a lifetime scenery.
name: A Rare Sight

description: You watched the beautiful comet shower.
name: Watch the comet with your crew

description: You continued on with your travels
name: Continue travels

Choice-1: Watch the comet with your crew
description: Captain, an extremely rare comet shower is occurring outside the shuttle. I suggest you take a rest and go see the event with the rest of your crew.
name: Comet Shower

description: You and your crew have adapted to the traumatic event that happened on earth.
name: Foster resilience

description: You and your crew made biogene from unusable resources
name: Use boost to improve productivity

Choice-2:
Use boost to improve productivity
+5 Biogene
description: The story of Apollo 13’s safe return after disaster is boosting crew confidence, inspiring adaptability in critical situations
name: The Apollo 13 Effect

description: You humbly introduced yourself to the rodents and they gave you some of their crops in return
name: Humbly introduce yourself

description: The rodents are intimidated by your presence, still they give you some food.
name: Display your magnificence

description: Captain, data shows that this planet is deemed to be safe for human respiration. Earlier, a creature approached our shuttle with a similar composition to earth’s rodents. It seems they want to make peace with your crew.
name: Welcome to Radonti

description: You gave some fuel to the rodents
name: Give some Fuel

description: You gave some Biogene to the rodents
name: Give some Biogene

description: You refuse to give some of your supplies to the rodent.
name: Refuse

description: One of the Rodents is offering you a bundle of tiny crops in exchange for a foreign substance that they have not encountered yet. It seems that they want to further their research using substances in our civilization.
name: A Plea for Scientific Advancement

description: You decided to lead the rodents into a brighter future.
name: Be the leader that they need

description: You told them that you are trying to find other human.
name: Tell them that you cannot stay

Choice-1: Be the leader that they need
Choice-2: Tell them that you cannot stay
description: Captain, after staying for a few days on the planet, I have determined the rodents direly needed a proper leader to further develop their society. Recently they have been offering you a position as their leader here in this planet. Should you choose to stay, you and your crew will have to lead the rodents or otherwise say your farewell to them when it's time.
name: To Lead or not to Lead

description: You exchanged the nameplate for medicines
name: Exchange for Medicine

description: You exchanged them for Relaxants
name: Exchange for Relaxants

description: You contacted the treasure hunters and they gave you some supplies
name: Contact the treasure hunters

description: You dismantled the Mariner 10
name: Dismantle the Mariner 10

description: Captain, Cassini has found a part of the telescope of the Mariner 10 outside our shuttle. Should we contact the treasure hunters or should we dismantle it.
name: The Mariner 10

description: You contacted the Treasure Hunters and gave them Galileo in exchange of Medicine
name: Contact the Treasure Hunters

description: You dismantle the Galileo Spacecraft
name: Dismantle the spacecraft

Choice-2:
Dismantle the Galileo Spacecraft
+30 Spare Parts
description: Captain, Cassini has found a part of the Galileo Spacecraft outside our shuttle. Should we contact the treasure hunters or should we dismantle it.
name: The Galileo Spacecraft

description: An unknown vessel is approaching our shuttle. They introduced themselves as treasure hunters that collect old spacecraft parts. We currently have a nameplate that they are searching for. They are offering medicine or relaxants in exchange for Juno’s nameplate. They also give you their contact information when you find another.
name: The Treasure Hunters

description: You dismantled the nameplate for spare parts
name: Dismantle

description: You kept the nameplate for Juno
name: Keep the nameplate

description: You kept the nameplate of Juno
name: Keep the nameplate

description: Cassini retrieval successful. It seems to be clutching on a crate. After a scan, the crate contains a nameplate of the spacecraft called Juno. It seems valuable, Captain. What action will you take.
name: A Drone Named "Cassini"

description: You retrieve the drone
name: Retrieve it

description: You left the drone.
name: Leave it

description: Captain, one of our drones, named Cassini, has been hit by unknown debris. Do we try to retrieve it, or do we leave it captain?
name: A Drone Set Loose

description: You set up a memorial for Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin
name: Set up a memorial

description: You skipped making the material and continued on with your life.
name: Skip the memorial

Choice-1:
Set up a memorial
+10 Crew Sanity
description: We are near the Apollo 11 mission's historic path. Would you like to log a memorial entry in honor of Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin?
name: The Apollo 11 Mission

description: Your crew consumed the purple cactus fruit... And it was delectable!
name: Consume the purple cactus fruit

description: You and your crew discarded the fruit
name: Discard it

description: During your stay on the sands, you found a peculiar fruit growing on a purple cactus. I have scanned it to be edible, but the side effects of consumption are unknown. Should we try and forage the fruit?
name: Taste like Purple

description: You opened it without damaging the content.
name: Open it using a crowbar

description: You tried to open it with all your might causing the box to be flung, damaging its contents.
name: Forcefully Open it

description: You threw the box, destroying it and the contents
name: Throw it

HiddenChoice:
Open it using a crowbar
+40 Spare Parts
description: One of the debris of SpaceX is currently locked in a crate, if we can open it, we could use the debris as a spare part. It is very fragile though, so we might need equipment to open it.
name: The SpaceX Crate

description: You made an exchange with the robot.
name: Exchange with the robot

description: You ignored the robot
name: Ignore its plea

Choice-1:
Exchange with the Robot
+20 Fuel
-10 Spare Parts
description: One of the bots on the planet is searching for parts to fix its broken plating. It offered to trade you some of its fuel cans in exchange for some of your scrap parts. Should we accept their offer?
name: The Broken Robot

description: You and your crew rest your body. After waking up, you found a supply next to you. Strange.
name: Rest your body

description: You stayed up, you didn't feel tired.
name: Stay up

description: Study suggests that a human body needs rest, captain. Leave the navigation to me and rest with your crew. Although, it may consume more fuel than usual.
name: Rest is also Important

description: You collected the materials in spite of the rocks and dust
name: Collect Biogenic Materials

description: You can't risk damaging the ship just for the materials
name: Take on other paths

description: Alert: Passing through a nebula, dust turbulence is imminent. Captain, traces of biogenetic rich materials detected in the dust. Taking other paths is suggested.
name: The Dusty Trail

description: You managed to fix all of the damages that your shuttle sustained
name: Fix all damages

description: Due to the minimal effort, the plating of the shuttle flew off causing a fuel valve to be hit.
name: Fix with minimal effort.

Choice-1:
Fix all damages
-30 Spare Parts
-1 Duct Tape
description: After passing through the Nebula, your shuttle has been damaged causing your hull to be ridden with holes. Immediate Fix is recommended.
name: Done and Dusted

description: You used the system's built-in Anti-virus
name: Open Anti-virus protocol to close the Adware

description: You bought the enticing promo seen in the Ad and you were disappointed
name: Buy the Promo

Choice-1: Open Anti-virus protocol to close the Adware
description: Error: AI System Compromised. BUY! BUY! BUY! Limited Supply! 100 Rations for 20 Biogene! Sales last until supplies are diminished!
name: Error: Huge Sale

description: You run the diagnostics of the shuttle only to find nothing.
name: Run Diagnostics

description: You ignored the anomaly and continued on with your life
name: Ignore the anomaly

description: Captain, an anomaly has been detected on our engine. System diagnostic is recommended.
name: An Unknown Anomaly

description: You conducted the study on Microgravity
name: Conduct study

description: You saved the rations from being sent out in space.
name: Save the Ration

description: You saved the Biogene from being sent out in space
name: Save the Biogene

description: Captain, we have an Apollo 13 protocol at bay. An oxygen tank suddenly exploded, we might need to choose what to save between the some of the ration or the biogene.
name: Apollo 13 Protocol

description: You think that it is redundant to study gravity any further.
name: Skip the study

description: This section of our mission offers an ideal chance to study microgravity effects on crew health and equipment. It’s purely observational but could provide future insights.
name: Gravitating Studies

description: Regina, your biologist created a solution for the toxic gas using the biogene
name: Create a solution to neutralize the toxic gas

description: The gas is removed quickly, but the crew suffers due to sudden loss of oxygen.
name: Vent the entire room immediately

description: Controlled venting reduces gas exposure and sudden loss of oxygen but allows some toxin to linger contaminating food rations.
name: Vent the room slowly

Choice-1:
Vent the entire room immediately
-10 Oxygen
HiddenChoice:
Create a solution to neutralize the toxic gas
-10 Biogene
description: Alert: Toxic gas leak detected in the medical bay. Immediate venting is required, or additional resources may help neutralize it safely. Venting the room would reduce the oxygen for you and your crew.
name: Toxic Gas Leak?

description: The circuitry is fully repaired, reducing the chance of future issues but requiring more resources.
name: Use more resources to ensure that it won’t be faulty again.

description: The repair is less thorough, thus leading to some minor electrical shocks leaving the system vulnerable to future faults.
name: Try to save some resources.

Choice-1:
Use more resources to ensure that it won’t be faulty again.
-25 Spare Parts
Choice-2:
Try to save some resources.
-5 Spare Parts
-10 Health to Crew
description: Captain, I’m detecting an electrical fault in the ship’s circuitry. Ignoring it may compromise essential functions of the shuttle. Immediate repairs are strongly recommended.
name: Faulty Circuitry

description: The fire is put out immediately, but repairs cost us some resources.
name: Extinguish and fix the damage caused by the fire

description: The fire eventually died down, but the engine is significantly damage and crew was expose to smoke for too long
name: Let the fire die down before fixing the engine.

Choice-1:
Extinguish and fix the damage caused by the fire
-25 Spare Parts
Choice-2:
Let the fire die down before fixing the engine.
-20 Spare Parts
description: Captain, A fire has broken out in the engine room. Please extinguish it quickly to prevent further damage.
name: A Fiery Engine

description: The panels are patched securely, restoring powder reserves, valuable spare parts are used.
name: Patch it with spare parts

description: Duct Tape temporarily holds the panels together, but repair did not last leading to insufficient power for life support systems.
name: Patch it with duct tape

Choice-1:
Patch it with spare parts
-10 Spare Parts
Choice-2:
Patch it with duct tape
-1 Duct Tape
description: Alert! A sudden minor comet shower has damaged the solar panels. Power reserves are dwindling, so repairs are necessary to restore efficiency.
name: Broken Solar Panels
